text: Samsul Arifin (born 10 May 1985) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a full-back for Liga 1 club PSS Sleman. ==Career== He was signed for PSS Sleman to played in Liga 1 on 2020 season. ==Honours== ===International=== ;Indonesia U-21 *Hassanal Bolkiah Trophy runner-up: 2012 ==References== ==External links== * Samsul Arifin at Liga Indonesia * Samsul Arifin at Soccerway Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Persela Lamongan players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Association football defenders
title: Samsul Arifin
